name: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down
synopsis: In late 1993, the United States launched dual military operations in Mogadishu Somalia.  Delta Force Operatives and Army Rangers were sent in to capture Somali warlords and restore order.  As a Delta Force operative, it's your mission to join daring and intense raids against the oppressive Somali warlords in and around Mogadishu.  Get ready for an intense combat--in solo missions or online multiplayer battles--featuring an arsenal of heavy weapons, military vehicles, and helicopters.
